author: sproul
content:
Regarding slashing protection (EIP-3076), I would like to propose a change to the standardised tests and I'm looking for input from implementers. There's an issue with the interaction between `allow_partial_import`, duplicate pubkeys, and slashable attestations

https://github.com/eth2-clients/slashing-protection-interchange-tests/releases/tag/v5.1.0-alpha.1

cc <@!340345049063882753> <@!570268431522201601> <@!311971895828283393> <@!681273808841474198> <@!688748669268132001>
